level.heading: Freedom of Information Act exception.
level.text: Except for records made public according to the regulations promulgated by the Mayor pursuant to ยง 22-4011(g), no sex offender registration information shall be available as a public record under ยง 2-532.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-137, see notes following ยง 22-4001.
